verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praise<s%> to you.

I will <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> for your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and for your <S%H571>truth:<s%> for you have <S%H1431>magnified<s%> your <S%H565>word<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>cried<s%> you <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and <S%H7292>strengthened<s%> me with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Yes, they shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H3588>Though<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7311>high,<s%> yet has he <S%H7200>respect<s%> to the <S%H8217>lowly:<s%> but the <S%H1364>proud<s%> he <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H4801>afar<s%> off.

<S%H518>Though<s%> I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> you will <S%H2421>revive<s%> me: you shall <S%H7971>stretch<s%> forth your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1584>perfect<s%> that which <S%H1157>concerns<s%> me: your <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> <S%H7503>forsake<s%> not the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
